branchCategory.name: KN, Insert Fitting Type Air Nozzle
branchCategory.description: <p>The KN series air nozzle with self align fittings is available in a range orifice sizes for installation on 4mm to 20mm tubing.&nbsp; These are available in both fixed and pivoting nozzle designs.</p>
